features: High-capacity storage to go, fast data transfer rates, you can save and backup any files, movies, music, photos, games and more.
Simple & Ultra slim, the small, light weight enclosure features massive capacity and high quality and reliability.
Plug and Play - Without software to install, just plug and play with USB connection.
Ultra-fast Data Transfers - Works with USB3.0 and USB2.0 to deliver, up to 5Gbps transfer speed, which is about 10 times as fast as USB 2.0
System Compatibility - It can compatible with PC, Desktop, Laptop, MacBook, Chromebook, Xbox One consoles.
body.description: HWAYO Portable External Hard Drive 1. HWAYO portable hard drives with USB 3.0 and SATA port offer reliable, fast data transfer rates and universal connectivity with USB 2.0 and USB 3.0 devices. It's a great gift choose. 2. Simple & Ultra slim - Sleek, all aluminum enclosure for durability, Seamless connection. The small, light weight enclosure features massive capacity and high quality and reliability. 3. Plug and Play - This external drive is ready to use without external power supply or software installation needed. 4. Ultra-fast Data Transfers - Works with USB3.0 and SATA cable to deliver, allows up to 6Gbps transfer speed. 5. Auto sleep when not operated for 10min function to prevent body heat and cut consumption. 6. System Compatibility - It is compatible with Windows 7/8/8.1/10, Mac, Linux, Android OS and more. It's suitable for PC, Desktop, Laptop, MacBook, Chromebook, Xbox One, Xbox One S series consoles. 7. By default, This HWAYO portable hard drive is formatted as EXFAT. You can Reformat it if you want to use it on your specific requirements. System: Windows7/8/8.1/10, Format Support: FAT/FAT32/NTFS/EXFAT System: Mac，Format Support: APFS/EXFAT System: Linux , Format: EXT2/EXT3/EXT4 System: Android ，Format: FAT32/NTFS System: Xbox360 ，Format: FAT32 System: Xbox one， Format: EXFAT/FAT32 System: PS 4, Format: EXFAT/FAT32 Package included: 1 x Portable External Hard Drive 1 x USB3.0 to SATA Cable 1 x User Manual Note: As the manufacture use the different measurement standard , the theory 1MB is 1024 bytes on manufacturing process, 1GB=1,000MB / 1.024 / 1.024 / 1.024 = about 931 MB. According to this proverbial situation, the drive will display lower capacity. 40GB≈37GB60GB≈56GB 80GB≈74GB120GB≈111GB 160GB≈149GB250GB≈232GB 320GB≈298GB500GB≈465GB 750GB≈698GB1TB≈931GB

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 617 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unreliable. Spend a bit more money for a better product.
reviews.reviewText: Used this for Xbox One. Was great for a few months. Then began having issues. Started with clicking and spinning noises. Soft at first, relatively louder over time until eventually it was unbearably loud even when Xbox was turned off. I flipped its position and the sound stopped. Then it began again with soft soft noise, slowly got louder, when I put it in the first position it was still loud. Then the real problems started. The CONSTANT corruption of my data files. Cue me wiping, reformatting, redownloading everything multiple times in the last 6-8 months. It would work for about a month after hours of reformatting and redownloding, then make error codes when starting games/apps, then eventually saying those games and apps don’t exist on the hard drive or Xbox. Would not recommend this, don’t be cheap spend a little extra dough on a better hard drive and you’ll thank yourself later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works fine for my Xbox one x
reviews.reviewText: This is a little heavy but lightweight at the same time very durable hard drive no issues i use it for my Xbox one x and hooked it up and it works smoothly and has a great capacity storage i would purchase this again if I would have to buy another one again so I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great capacity. A little slow in response time/speed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Plug in and use
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. I may update at a later date

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I attempted to transfer ~30GB worth of files from my backup external HD to this HWAYO HD via personal laptop. The transfer stalled many times and i tried to cancel. The cancellation got hung up and i disconnected the drive. I then connected the HWAYO drive to my work PC thinking a transfer of files from work internal HD to HWAYO external HD would be faster. Work computer requires Bitlocker encryption so i expected a prompt for encrypting the HWAYO drive. My work laptop would not even recognize the HWAYO drive. So I disconnected the HWAYO drive and rebooted my work PC but it would not reboot without the bitlocker password for my internal HD. Somehow my work PC configuration got screwed up and my company IT department had to take my computer to fix. The HWAYO went in the electronics recycling

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Excellent product worth the price. Has lot of storage capacity. It is easy to transfer files from my computer to this and watch them on TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great so far!
reviews.reviewText: I like this. Easy to use, seems to hold way more than enough for what I needed it for. I used it to pull old pictures/videos/documents from my old laptop to put on my new one. Super fast and easy for me to use for not that much money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
